Palla: Susceptibility of Trichomonas vaginalis to metronidazole: A survey of 76 random isolates. 63- 65. Ferenc Varnai, D. Banhegyi, Eva Fülöp: Imported Cutaneous Leishmaniasis in Hungary. 67- 72.
